title: Typing/backspace rotating word animation for Home hero headline span

requirements.summary: Implement a looping typing + backspace animation for the existing Home hero headline <h1> span, cycling Planning → Precision → Performance continuously without changing styling.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the selected `<span>` in the hero `<h1>` displays a typing animation for the word "Planning", then deletes the full word via a backspace effect, then types "Precision", deletes it, then types "Performance", deletes it, and repeats from "Planning" indefinitely.
Only the selected span’s text content/behavior is changed; its existing Tailwind class(es) (including its color class) remain unchanged and the visual font/color do not change.
The animation runs smoothly on both desktop and mobile and does not cause layout breakage or clipping in the hero headline.

file_operations.description: Update only the hero headline span currently rendering "Excellence" to instead render a state-driven animated string. Implement in-file typing/backspace logic (e.g., React state + effect with timed updates) that cycles through ["Planning","Precision","Performance"], types each word character-by-character, deletes the full word character-by-character, and loops indefinitely. Keep the span’s existing Tailwind classes unchanged and avoid any styling changes elsewhere in the page.
